features.title: Contributors Management in Curation Form
features.description: Added comprehensive contributors section to the DataCite form with support for persons and institutions, role management using Tagify-based inputs, and affiliation handling. Contributors are distinguished from authors and support various contributor types including research groups.

features.title: Save Contributors with Roles and Affiliations
features.description: Complete persistence of contributor data alongside authors with form hydration using stored contributors, support for multiple roles per contributor, normalization of affiliation data, and reuse of existing institutions. Includes unified serialization logic for affiliations to reduce code duplication.

features.title: Import Contributors from DataCite XML
features.description: Automatically extract contributors from uploaded DataCite XML files with role normalization, deduplication of contributors, and proper handling of research groups as institutions. Supports Work Package Leader and other contributor-specific roles.

features.title: API for Old Dataset Contributors
features.description: New endpoint to fetch contributors (excluding authors) from legacy datasets with intelligent role mapping from legacy role names to new slugs. Includes enhanced person/institution detection logic with name parsing utilities, support for comma-separated names, and comprehensive tests (Vitest, Playwright).

features.title: Roles API Endpoint
features.description: New API endpoint to fetch available roles with metadata columns and activation flags. Includes author-specific and contributor-specific role filtering, OpenAPI documentation, and service-specific API key protection. Role configuration is frozen to ensure consistency.

improvements.title: Contributors Section UX
improvements.description: Contributors accordion is now expanded by default on the curation form for better visibility and easier data entry.

improvements.title: API Documentation Refinement
improvements.description: Restricted public API documentation to secured ELMO endpoints only, improving security and clarity of the API surface.

improvements.title: Code Organization
improvements.description: Enforced consistent import sorting via ESLint, refactored import order across multiple components for improved readability, and extracted shared Tagify helpers for DataCite tests to reduce code duplication.

improvements.title: Affiliation Data Quality
improvements.description: Enhanced affiliation serialization to trim whitespace, filter out empty affiliations, deduplicate entries, and normalize values to ensure data quality.

improvements.title: Database Schema Clarity
improvements.description: Renamed author_role pivot table to resource_author_role for improved clarity and consistency in Eloquent relationships.

improvements.title: Session Management in Production
improvements.description: Introduced SESSION_PATH environment variable to docker-compose.prod.yml for improved session handling in production environments.

fixes.title: Author/Contributor Role Filtering
fixes.description: Refactored role filtering logic to explicitly filter ResourceAuthors based on the 'applies_to' property at the controller level instead of in model relationships, improving accuracy and maintainability.

fixes.title: Playwright Test Selectors
fixes.description: Scoped author Playwright selectors to authors panel and fixed author indexing to prevent test flakiness and improve test reliability.

fixes.title: Contributor Role Field
fixes.description: Made roles input field required for contributors and disabled dropdown to enforce proper role selection through the tag input interface.

fixes.title: PHPStan Warnings
fixes.description: Resolved PHPStan warnings in contributor deduplication logic and role scope annotations with Builder generics.

features.title: Authors Management in Curation Form
features.description: Added comprehensive authors section with support for persons and institutions, ORCID input fields, contact person functionality, role and affiliation management using Tagify-based inputs, and extensive end-to-end tests with Playwright. Includes accessible implementation with optimized aria-label usage.

features.title: ROR Affiliation Synchronization
features.description: Integrated Research Organization Registry (ROR) with automatic data synchronization, autocomplete functionality for affiliations with ROR IDs, support for ZIP archives containing ROR data, and a new data structure using prefLabel, rorId, and otherLabel fields. Includes comprehensive tests for ROR data fetching and processing.

features.title: Import Authors from DataCite XML
features.description: Automatically extract authors from uploaded DataCite XML files with proper handling of nested creator elements.

features.title: API for Old Dataset Authors
features.description: New endpoint to fetch authors from legacy datasets with fuzzy matching for contact information and affiliations. Frontend integration automatically loads legacy authors into the curation form. Includes ORCID support, optimized queries to avoid N+1 problems, improved name normalization with diacritic removal, and comprehensive tests (Pest, Playwright, Vitest).

features.title: ROR ID Badges for Affiliations
features.description: Display ROR ID badges for matched affiliations with clickable links to ROR identifiers, improved normalization of affiliation data, and consistent formatting of ROR URLs.

features.title: Persistent Sorting for Old Datasets
features.description: Added sorting controls for the old datasets table with lazy loading that respects server-side sorting and persistent storage of sort preferences.

features.title: Store Authors with Roles and Affiliations
features.description: Complete persistence of author management data with form hydration using stored authors, support for ROR IDs for institutions, normalization of boolean values, and reuse of existing institutions.

features.title: API Key Authentication for ELMO Resource Types
features.description: Protected ELMO endpoint with configurable API key using new ELMO_API_KEY environment variable. Configuration added to .env.example and stack.env with updated tests for consistent test environment.

features.title: Dashboard Statistics Card
features.description: Show total datasets count on dashboard with new statistics card.

improvements.title: Test Timeout Adjustments
improvements.description: Increased timeout for DataCiteForm author management tests to improve test reliability.

improvements.title: Layout and Accessibility Enhancements
improvements.description: Improved layout and accessibility for author fields with optimized spacing and better screen reader support.

improvements.title: Query Optimization
improvements.description: Optimized queries for contact information matching to reduce database load and improve performance.

improvements.title: Error Handling
improvements.description: Enhanced error handling and messaging throughout the application for better user feedback.

fixes.title: DataCite Author Extraction
fixes.description: Fixed DataCite author extraction to correctly ignore nested creator elements.

fixes.title: PHPStan Issues
fixes.description: Resolved PHPStan issues for ROR synchronization and author affiliations.

fixes.title: JSON File Error Handling
fixes.description: Improved error handling for JSON file read operations.

fixes.title: TagInputField Dropdown Settings
fixes.description: Corrected dropdown settings merge in TagInputField component.

fixes.title: MockTagify Reset
fixes.description: Fixed MockTagify removeAllTags method to correctly clear the value array.

features.title: Resources workspace
features.description: Browse curated resources with metadata badges, DOI links, pagination details, and quick edit or delete actions.

features.title: Dashboard overview
features.description: Surface key statistics like the total resource count alongside shortcuts to curation and documentation.

features.title: Resource Information form group
features.description: Added structured resource information section.

features.title: License and Rights form group
features.description: Include license and rights details for resources.

features.title: Link to Dev Repository
features.description: Added link to the development repository on GitHub for transparency.

features.title: Changelog
features.description: Added a interactive changelog to track updates and changes.

features.title: User creation
features.description: Added admin command to create new users.

features.title: User documentation
features.description: Added new site for user documentation and help.

features.title: Footer
features.description: Added a footer with link to legal notice, changelog and about page.

features.title: SPDX sync
features.description: Added a new command for auto syncing SPDX licenses from spdx.org.

improvements.title: Testing Enhancements
improvements.description: Improved test coverage and reliability with modern testing frameworks Pest, Vitest and Playwright.

improvements.title: Registration closed

improvements.title: Resource table layout
improvements.description: Streamlined the resources list with clearer spacing, responsive formatting, and accessible typography.

improvements.title: Deletion confirmations
improvements.description: Added confirm dialogs and loading states so resource removals stay intentional and transparent.
